titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on machinery for molding and forming certain articles.
To suspend temporarily the duty on machinery for molding and forming certain articles.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2010, the duty on certain parts of machinery for molding and forming certain articles.
